title: Problem JSON
description: Problem JSON schema representing errors and status code

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type

in.description: Location of the error (e.g., body, query, header)

location.description: Location in the document where the error occurred (JSON Pointer)

code.description: A code representing the type of error

detail.description: A detailed message describing the error

items.description: List of errors encountered during processing
